nio/XeroCreateInvoice.description: The XeroCreateInvoice block creates invoices in a Xero account.

consumer_key.title: Xero Consumer Key
consumer_key.description: API Consumer Key from Xero application.

default.description: Any list of signals containing relevant invoice data.
Create Invoice request response from Xero

nio/XeroManualJournals.description: Create manual journal entries in a Xero account.

consumer_key.title: Xero Consumer Key
consumer_key.description: API Consumer Key from Xero application.

manual_journal_entries.title: Manual Journal Entries
manual_journal_entries.description: Journal entries to add to xero.  Each entry can have multiple lines containing different accounting data.

default.description: Any list of signals containing relevant manual journal data.
Post manual journal response from Xero.

nio/XeroUpdateInvoice.description: Add a payment to a previously created invoice in a Xero account.

consumer_key.title: Xero Consumer Key
consumer_key.description: API Consumer Key from Xero application.

invoice_account_code.title: Invoice Account Code
invoice_account_code.description: Account code to apply the payment to.

payment_amount.title: Amount Paid
payment_amount.description: Amount paid by customer, should be equal to original invoice amount.

default.description: Any list of signals containing relevant payment data.
Post payment response from Xero application.
